Sniff a menu.
Order a drink beginning with I.
Rub a spoon on the nearest persons nose.
Eat a crisp covered in horseradish.
Phone someone called Terry.
Pretend you are an egg.
Lift a fork in the style of a weightlifter.
Mention to the person on your left they have a testicle hanging out their ear.
Change your name to Brian for next 5 minutes (unless your name is actually Brian, in which case, utilise the name Beryl)
Pretend you are a doctor, using a straw as a stethoscope and saying everything will be fine but with a concerned face.
Do an impression of a filing cabinet.
Flip a coin and, no matter what way it lands, give the impression the world has ended and say 'I never wanted this'
Say to the person in front of you that in a previous life you were a pigeon and you must go to Trafalgar Square immediately.
Tell everyone you have a condition that is directly related to eating chewing gum you found stuck under the desk at school.
Mention you have never actually urinated and discuss if you should seek medical advice.
Say you are going for a run and if anyone has spare toilet paper.
Eat a whole parsnip with chop sticks.
Lay on a bed of nails.
Play the tambourine using only your feet.
Do 10 star jumps while shouting 'I love potatoes'
Speak in a pirate voice for the next 2 minutes
Say 'potato' in 5 different accents
